committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A joint resolution redesignating the Saint Croix Island National Monument in the State of Maine as the "Saint Croix Island International Historic Site".

summary.as: Senate agreed to House amendment with amendment
summary.text: (Senate agreed to House amendments with an amendment) Redesignates the Saint Croix Island National Monument in Maine as the Saint Croix Island International Historic Site.

titles.title: A joint resolution redesignating the Saint Croix Island National Monument in the State of Maine as the "Saint Croix Island International Historic Site".
